summary:
The Security Council,

Recalling previous relevant resolutions, the General Framework Agreement for Peace in Bosnia and Herzegovina (Peace Agreement, S/1995/999, annex) and conclusions of Peace Implementation Conferences, 

1. Welcomes and agrees to the designation of Mr. Valentin Inzko as High Representative, succeeding Mr. Miroslav Lajčák, as designated by the Steering Board of the Peace Implementation Council on 13 March 2009.

2. Pays tribute to Mr. Miroslav Lajčák's efforts as High Representative.

3. Reaffirms the importance of the High Representative's role in implementing the Peace Agreement and coordinating civilian organizations and agencies.

4. Reaffirms the High Representative's final authority in theatre regarding the interpretation of annex 10 on civilian implementation of the Peace Agreement.

5. Takes note of the Steering Board's Declarations on 27 February 2008 and 20 November 2008 regarding fulfilment of objectives and conditions for transitioning from the Office of the High Representative to an Office of the EU Special Representative in Bosnia and Herzegovina.

6. Decides to remain seized of the matter.
